name: Burro Banana
pros: Burro bananas are more squared in shape than common yellow bananas.
Good source of potassium and fiber and very low in calories.
High in potassium and also contain vitamin B, vitamin C, fiber and magnesium, phosphorous, calcium, iron, zinc, copper and selenium.
Burro bananas are high in iron content and therefore aid in treating anemia.
Helpful in providing relief from painful and excessive bleeding during the menstrual cycle.
It has been used as an antacid food to soothe upset stomachs.
Packed with antioxidant compounds and a mix of essential minerals that boost the health of your eyes.
